sentences.en: ...their readiness to co-operate with the new U.S. envoy.
sentences.cn: …他们乐意与美国的新特使合作。

sentences.en: Britain was signalling its readiness to have the embargo lifted.
sentences.cn: 英国表示愿意取消贸易禁令。

sentences.en: Can this be called readiness to accept criticism?
sentences.cn: 这能叫虚心接受批评 么 ?

sentences.en: Everyone has doubts about their readiness for parenthood.
sentences.cn: 自己是否作好了为人父母的准备，人人都会感到疑虑。

sentences.en: Everyone was struck by their readiness to pass on all they knew.
sentences.cn: 他们很愿意把自己的知识传给别人,这给每个人都留下深刻印象.

sentences.en: He answered all the questions with a readiness that startled everyone present.
sentences.cn: 他敏捷地回答了所有问题,使在座的每个人为之震惊.

sentences.en: He had intimated to the French and Russians his readiness to come to a settlement.
sentences.cn: 他已经向法国人和俄国人暗示他愿意达成协议。

sentences.en: He held his gun in readiness.
He is putting the accent on military readiness.
sentences.cn: 他强调要保持备战状态。

sentences.en: He thought Miss Archer sometimes of too precipitate a readiness.
sentences.cn: 他觉得,阿切尔小姐有时太性急,太直接了当.

sentences.en: Hungary has indicated its readiness to sign the treaty.
sentences.cn: 匈牙利已表示愿意签订该条约.

sentences.en: It is not a question of ability but one of readiness.
Security tightened in the capital in readiness for the president's arrival.
sentences.cn: 首都加强了警备，准备迎接总统的到来。

sentences.en: The newsletter was printed towards the end of June in readiness for mailing.
sentences.cn: 快到6月底的时候，时事通讯印刷完毕准备投寄。

sentences.en: The troops have entered into combat readiness.
True guilt is characterized by a readiness to make atonement for having done wrong.
sentences.cn: 真正的内疚表现为愿意弥补所犯的过错。

words.tran_cn: 准备好；现成的；迅速的；情愿的；快要…的
容易地；乐意地；无困难地
敏捷，迅速；[计]准备就绪；愿意

phrases.tran_cn: 装卸准备完成通知书；装卸准备就绪通知书；备装通知

trans.tran_en: when you are prepared for something, or when something is ready to be used
